BIO

Technology has always been my personal playground; now, it’s my professional craft. Since launching my career in early 2023, I’ve moved rapidly from learning frameworks to managing the web presence of dozens of clients at ActivPC. I specialize in the full stack of WordPress development - bridging the gap between modern UI design and the 'under-the-hood' server architecture that keeps a business running. Beyond the code, I bring a background in computer science fundamentals and a relentless drive to solve complex production problems.
